stars.help: Repositories with less than ${minStars} get an increasing penalty, up to -${maxPenalty} points.

open-issues.help: If the ratio of open issues (capped at ${maxOpenIssues} to stars is below 1:${openIssueRatio}, a penalty of up to -${maxPenalty} is applied.

issues.help: If the last 100 issues have an open/closed ratio below ${openClosedIssueQuota}, a flat penalty of -${maxPenalty} is issued.

commit-activity.help: For each month without any commits, a penalty of -${monthlyPenalty} is applied (up to -${maxPenalty}).

contributors.help: At least ${minContributors} are required to prevent penalty, anything less leads to an increasing penalty (up to -${maxPenalty}).
